attrs.name: disabled
attrs.title: 禁用
attrs.description: 是否禁用。禁用后不会响应点击事件。

attrs.name: to
attrs.title: 路由链接
attrs.description: 需要 vue-router，与`<router-link>`的`to`属性相同。可以是一个字符串或者是描述目标位置的对象。

attrs.name: replace
attrs.title: 替换
attrs.description: 需要 vue-router，与`<router-link>`的`replace`属性相同。如果为`true`，当点击时，会调用`router.replace()`而不是`router.push()`，于是导航后不会留下`history `记录。

attrs.name: append
attrs.title: 追加路径
attrs.description: 需要 vue-router，与`<router-link>`的`append`属性相同。如果为`true`，则在当前路径后追加`to`的路径。

name: 图片展示
description: 可以用来展示一张图片，支持设置图片地址。
blocks:
[{"title":"拉伸图片，使图片填满元素","description":"","code":"<template>
<van-image src="https://static-vusion.nos-eastchina1.126.net/h5-template/cat.jpeg" fit="fill"></van-image>
</template>
"},{"title":"保持宽高缩放图片，使图片的长边能完全显示出来","description":"","code":"<template>
<van-image src="https://static-vusion.nos-eastchina1.126.net/h5-template/cat.jpeg" fit="contain"></van-image>
</template>
"},{"title":"保持宽高缩放图片，使图片的短边能完全显示出来，裁剪长边","description":"","code":"<template>
<van-image src="https://static-vusion.nos-eastchina1.126.net/h5-template/cat.jpeg" fit="cover"></van-image>
</template>
"},{"title":"保持图片原有尺寸","description":"","code":"<template>
<van-image src="https://static-vusion.nos-eastchina1.126.net/h5-template/cat.jpeg" fit="none"></van-image>
</template>
"},{"title":"取 contain、none 中较小的","description":"","code":"<template>
<van-image src="https://static-vusion.nos-eastchina1.126.net/h5-template/cat.jpeg" fit="scale-down"></van-image>
</template>
"}]

jsonSchema.name: van-image

blocks.title: 拉伸图片，使图片填满元素

blocks:
[{"title":"基本用法","description":"","code":"<template>
<van-swipe class="my-swipe" :autoplay="3000" indicator-color="white" style="height:200px;">
  <van-swipe-item vusion-slot-name="default"><van-image style="width:100%;height:100%" src="https://static-vusion.163yun.com/assets/cloud-ui/1.jpg"></van-image></van-swipe-item>
  <van-swipe-item vusion-slot-name="default"><van-image style="width:100%;height:100%" src="https://static-vusion.163yun.com/assets/cloud-ui/2.jpg"></van-image></van-swipe-item>
  <van-swipe-item vusion-slot-name="default"><van-image style="width:100%;height:100%" src="https://static-vusion.163yun.com/assets/cloud-ui/3.jpg"></van-image></van-swipe-item>
  <van-swipe-item vusion-slot-name="default"><van-image style="width:100%;height:100%" src="https://static-vusion.163yun.com/assets/cloud-ui/4.jpg"></van-image></van-swipe-item>
</van-swipe>
</template>
